short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Visualize your time, stay organized, and make every moment count.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Useful essential tools to monitor time as it progresses. Watch your week, month, day, and current time unfold with dynamic progress bars.

Free Features:
•The free version of Time in Progress offers dynamic progress bars to track your week, month, day, and current time as they unfold."
•Compact mode

Premium Features:
Upgrade to Time in Progress Premium for advanced customization, additional tools, notifications, and stylish themes to maximize productivity and personalize your experience.

• Custom progress bars to your own target dates
• Variety of themes
• Calendar in the style of a heatmap to save events and countdowns to your personal milestones, Receive reminders as the dates approach. 
• Notifications and Chrome badge; Stay informed with notifications for calendar events and progress milestones. Customize the Chrome badge to show a day or year countdown, time until your birthday, or custom progress bar updates.
• Customizable Views; Save and toggle between personalized layouts, such as “Calendar View” or “Decades Timeline,” to suit your productivity style.
• Comprehensive Time Calculators & Tools; Time Converter, Age Calculator, Countdown Timer, Work Hour Calculator, Pomodoro Timer and more.

More tools and features coming soon!
